pullRequest.title: [1.16] ForgeEventFactory#canCreateFluidSource reintroduced
pullRequest.bodyText:
I reintroduced the ForgeEventFactory#canCreateFluidSource event, this allows you to set the water as not infinite.


This should close this issue #6987
If I have to change something, just tell me, since it's my first PR for Forge

nodes.bodyText: Should probably be disabled by default. Also, please keep you curly brackets style at least consistent within on class and move it to a new line.
nodes.diffHunk:

+package net.minecraftforge.debug.fluid;
+
+import net.minecraft.block.BlockState;
+import net.minecraft.fluid.FluidState;
+import net.minecraft.fluid.Fluids;
+import net.minecraftforge.event.world.BlockEvent;
+import net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event;
+import net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.SubscribeEvent;
+import net.minecraftforge.fml.common.Mod;
+
+@Mod("finite_water_test")
+@Mod.EventBusSubscriber()
+public class FiniteWaterTest {

nodes.bodyText: spaces between if and bracket please

This is not the correct place to insert the patch. Move it below to where if (this.canSourcesMultiply() && j >= 2) is checked, and replace it with j >= 2 && if (j >= 2 && net.minecraftforge.event.ForgeEventFactory.canCreateFluidSource(worldIn, pos, blockStateIn, canSourcesMultiply())), so you can also use the event the other way around (making fluid sources for blocks that normally don't make them).
It would also be better if we could just change the method to accept IWorldReader instead of casting to World.

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from MinecraftForge/1.16.x

Make license toml entry optional during 1.16.1
Now we can create infinite lava sources

nodes.bodyText: This is a binary-breaking change and won't be accepted for 1.16.
You can't just blindly cast things.
So if it's not an IWorld you can't access it at all? That's not helpful...

commit.message: Changed the type of parameters in FlowingFluid.java from IWorldReader to IWorld

CreateFluidSourceEvent inherits from Event

based on discord suggestions https://discord.com/channels/313125603924639766/725850371834118214/745547827693879298
